package.name: jimmy_control
package.description: This package is using the ros_cotrol library. The purpose of this package is to start a controller_manager node that will start a diff_driver controller. The diff_drive controller is initialized with the contents of a yaml file and interfaces with the hardware interface code in jimmy_base. This package used this project as guidance: https://github.com/eborghi10/my_ROS_mobile_robot
